document.full_text: brent crude oil surged more than $6 a barrel on monday, the second-largest gain on record, snapping back from last week's near record sell-off on a wave of bargain-hunting and a jump in gasoline futures prices.
document.title: oil rebounds, brent jump 2nd biggest day ever
lines_and_colors: brent crude oil surged more than $6 a barrel on monday, the second-largest gain on record, snapping back from last week's near record sell-off on a wave of bargain-hunting and a jump in gasoline futures prices.
